meanings.definition: A single computer instruction that represents a sequence of instructions.
meanings.sent1: The macroinstruction simplified the complex process into a single step.
meanings.sent2: The programmer used a macroinstruction to save time and effort.
meanings.sent3: The macroinstruction walked into the computer and magically did all the work.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a macroinstruction, guiding him through the steps effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The macroinstruction was like a superhero, completing tasks in a flash.

meanings.definition: A set of instructions that can be expanded into a sequence of instructions.
meanings.sent1: By following the macroinstruction, the student could complete the project easily.
meanings.sent2: The manual provided a macroinstruction for assembling the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The macroinstruction whispered secrets to the other instructions, making them giggle.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a macroinstruction, unfolding ideas one after another.
meanings.sent5: The macroinstruction was a map, guiding the way through the maze of tasks.
